Binary: libscalapack-openmpi1, libscalapack-mpich1, libscalapack-mpi-dev, scalapack-mpi-test, libscalapack-pvm1, libscalapack-pvm-dev, scalapack-pvm-test, scalapack-test-common
Build-Depends: mpi-default-dev, pvm-dev, blacs-pvm-dev, gfortran, liblapack-dev, libblas-dev, debhelper (>= 6), libblacs-mpi-dev, pkg-config
Package-List: libscalapack-mpi-dev deb libdevel extra arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hurd-i386,i386,kfreebsd-amd64,kfreebsd-i386,mips,mipsel,mips64,mips64el,powerpc,ppc64,ppc64el,sparc,s390x,x32,sparc64,hppa,m68k,sh4 libscalapack-mpich1 deb libs extra arch=m68k,sh4 libscalapack-openmpi1 deb libs extra arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hurd-i386,i386,kfreebsd-amd64,kfreebsd-i386,mips,mipsel,mips64,mips64el,powerpc,ppc64,ppc64el,sparc,s390x,x32,sparc64,hppa libscalapack-pvm-dev deb libdevel extra arch=any libscalapack-pvm1 deb libs extra arch=any scalapack-mpi-test deb math extra arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hurd-i386,i386,kfreebsd-amd64,kfreebsd-i386,mips,mipsel,mips64,mips64el,powerpc,ppc64,ppc64el,sparc,s390x,x32,sparc64,hppa,m68k,sh4 scalapack-pvm-test deb math extra arch=any scalapack-test-common deb devel extra arch=all
